nodes.text: Forces of Destiny: May the Force Be with Us Cinestory Comic

Forces of Destiny: May the Force Be with Us Cinestory Comic was a Star Wars: Forces of Destiny title in a comic-style format featuring adaptations of the program. It was slated for release on March 26, 2019, but the publisher subsequently went bankrupt and it may never have been distributed to retailers.

Rey, Ahsoka Tano, Jyn Erso, Princess Leia, Sabine Wren, and other icons of a galaxy far, far away take center stage in Star Wars Forces of Destiny – a new animated micro-series and initiative celebrating some of Star Wars most beloved and inspirational characters.
Star Wars fans of all ages can relive the all-new adventures of these beloved characters in the full-color cinestory comic adaptation of the animated shorts.
